about_the_game:
Valkyrie Squad: Breaking Through the Siege - Commander Handbook
(Basically, a Character Art Book)

Hello, Commander! This DLC contains classified information, including the designs and full-body illustrations of all Valkyrie Squad members, as well as the basic settings of the planets you are about to battle on and the possible monsters you may encounter.

If you'd like to support the developers a little, feel free to purchase it!
detailed_description:
Valkyrie Squad: Breaking Through the Siege - Commander Handbook

Hello, Commander! This DLC contains classified information, including the designs and full-body illustrations of all Valkyrie Squad members, as well as the basic settings of the planets you are about to battle on and the possible monsters you may encounter.

If you'd like to support the developers a little, feel free to purchase it!
